general.content_position_info: Only works when text overlay on image
general.custom_icon_info: Use square image for best result.
general.custom_svg_info: The SVG icon is rendered at the pre-defined size.
general.desktop_filter_and_sort_layout: Filter and sort layout on large screen
general.show_email_address_and_phone_number: Show email address and phone number
general.enable_filter_info: To customize Filter, use the Search & Discovery app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/search-and-discovery/filters)
general.resize_image_to_fit_container: Resize image to fit its container
general.enable_large_heading_info: Helpful when using this section as a hero section
general.show_paginations_as_number_on_mobile: Show paginations as number on mobile
general.extra_information_item_info: Hide item if heading is empty
general.contact_information_info: To display your contact information, link them in your Theme settings.
general.currency_selector_info: To add a currency, go to your [payment settings.](/admin/settings/payments)
general.language_selector_info: To add a language, go to your [language settings.](/admin/settings/languages)
general.newsletter_info: Customers who subscribe will have their email address added to the "accepts marketing " [customer list.](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/customers/manage-customers)
general.variant_selector_info: Variant selector always shows if available. You can configure variant options to display as swatches in theme settings.
general.heading: Heading
general.height_for_mobile_info: Height is always set to 100% on mobile
general.height_on_phone_info: Height will always set to 100% on phone
general.icon_source_info: Select one of the three sources below to display as an icon
general.items_per_row_on_desktop_horizontal: Items per row on desktop (Horizontal toolbar)
general.items_per_row_on_desktop_tablet_landscap: Items per row on desktop & tablet landscape
general.items_per_row_on_desktop_vertical: Items per row on desktop (Vertical sidebar)
general.items_per_row_on_tablet_portrait: Items per row on tablet portrait
general.label: Label
general.mask_overlay: Mask overlay will be disabled on Standard style.
general.open_external_link_in_new_tab: Open external link in a new tab
general.remove_padding_info: Not apply when using background image
general.section_height_info: Section will expand if content exceeded available area
general.selected_page_info: Contact forms in the selected page will not be displayed
general.show_dynamic_checkout_buttons_info: Using the payment methods available on your store, customers see their preferred option, like PayPal or Apple Pay.  [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/vi/manual/online-store/dynamic-checkout)
general.show_quantity_selector_info: Set based on how likely your buyers select more than one item at a time to add to cart. [Learn more](https://docs.saleshunterthemes.com/manual/featured-product/#Purchasing)
general.show_stock_number_info: Basic stock information still shows without stock number.
general.configure_variant_swatches_info: Configure variant swatches in theme settings.
general.size_guide_paragraph_info: Display information about product sizing which can support buyer's purchasing decision when selecting the right product option. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/dynamic-checkout)
general.header_direction_button_info: The Google Maps link needs to be filled for the button to show.
general.show_view_all_info: Show ‘View all' button if collection has more products than being shown
general.show_description_info: Add a description or image by editing your collection. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/collections/collection-layout)
general.show_view_all_button: Show 'View all' button to view all collections
general.value_info: Separate each value by a comma.
general.collection_heading_info: If none is set, collection title will be used.
general.enable_view_more_info: Appears if collection has more products than shown.
general.show_variant_swatches_info: Only shows if variant swatches is enabled
general.title: Title
general.view_details_button_paragraph_info: Use this to direct users to the product page.
general.payment_methods_info: To add a payment methods, go to your [payment settings](/admin/settings/payments)
general.paragraph_contact_info: To display your email address and phone number, link them in your theme settings.
general.paragraph_social_info: To display your social media accounts, link them in your theme settings.
general.show_payment_info: Icons display based on your Shopify payment methods
general.menu_heading_info: Enter a name to create a new menu item
general.mega_menu_image_info: Mega menu only work on large screens
general.menu_item_name_info: Enter the name of the menu item you would like to apply this mega menu. [Learn more](https://docs.saleshunterthemes.com/manual/blum-header/#mega-menu)
general.mega_menu_paragraph_info: Mega menu only works on large screens
general.collection_info: Show a list of product collections next to menu for better catalogue navigation
general.enable_drawer: Enable drawer menu on large screens
general.sticky_header_info: Header shows on the screen as customers scroll up.
general.logo_transparent_info: If no logo is set here it will use the default logo image instead
general.highlighted_collections_info: Show a list of product collections next to menu for better catalogue navigation
general.banner_link_info: Link applies to the whole banner without button.
general.height_info: 70% and 100% screen height only work on large screens (mobile always set to 100% height).
general.items_per_row_on_large_screen: Items per row on large screen
general.social_media_preview_info: If you include a link in social media posts, the page's featured image will be shown as the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/images/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images)
general.social_media_meta_info: A store title and description are included with the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/promoting-marketing/seo/adding-keywords#set-a-title-and-description-for-your-online-store)
general.blog_content_info: This content is from your blog post.
general.expand_all_filter: Expand all filter options by default
general.read_more_info: Shorten description content when more than 150 characters
general.pickup_availability_info: Shows available offline stores for the selected variant. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/shipping/setting-up-and-managing-your-shipping/local-methods/local-pickup)
general.cross_sell_deprecated_info: In the upcoming version, manual selection within the block will no longer be available. The only method for product selection will be through the Search & Discovery app.  [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/search-and-discovery/product-recommendations#complementary-products)
general.cross_sell_info: To select complementary products, use the Search & Discovery app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/search-and-discovery/product-recommendations#complementary-products)
general.cross_sell_product_info: This function will be deprecated in the next version
general.gift_card_recipient_info: Gift card products can optionally be sent direct to a recipient along with a personal message.
general.show_gift_card_recipient: Show recipient information form for gift card products
general.advanced_description_info: Shows richful content to show more about your products. [Learn more](https://docs.saleshunterthemes.com/manual/blum-product-template/#advanced-description)
general.purchasing_bar_position_info: Applies to screens that are wider than 458px
general.show_sticky_purchasing_bar: Show sticky purchasing bar when scrolling down
general.map_direction_button_info: The Map address field will need to be filled for the directions link to show.
general.map_address_info: Google Maps will load this location
general.newsletter_paragraph_info: Subscribers added automatically to your "Email subscribers" customer list. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/customers/manage-customers)
general.popup_info: Popup section will be deprecated in the next version. If you are using this section, please migrate to the new Popup section within the Overlay Group to ensure continued support and compatibility.
general.when_to_show_info: After add to cart will triger popup once visitors close the cart notification
general.related_products_auto_info: Show related products automatically based on product information and orders.
general.related_products_select_info: To select related products for a specific one, use the Search & Discovery app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/search-and-discovery/product-recommendations#related-products)
general.related_products_info: Product recommendation show related products by default based on product information and orders.
general.slideshow_description_info: Describe the slideshow for customers using screen readers.
general.slideshow_background_info: Recommend to use background image with the same ratio for all slides
general.slide_link_info: Link applies to the whole slide without button.
general.author: Author
general.timeline_mobile_info: Make sure headings of timeline items are incorporated.
general.video_alt_text_info: Describe the video to make it accessible for customers using screen readers. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/themes/theme-structure/theme-features#video)
general.video_thumbnail_info: Recommend using thumbnail with video ratio to avoid cropping
general.enable_parallax_prominent_badge: Enable parallax scrolling for Prominent badge
general.optimize_page_performance_info: Reducing animation usage on first fold section to improve page performance
general.show_excerpt_info: Change excerpts by editing your blog posts. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/blogs/writing-blogs#display-an-excerpt-from-a-blog-post)
general.free_shipping_minimum_info: Enter the minimum number based on order price that matches your free shipping rate. The free shipping amount displayed in the Cart will be automatically exchanged when the visitor switches currencies on the website. [Learn more](https://docs.saleshunterthemes.com/manual/theme-settings-blum/#Cart)
general.free_shipping_minimum: Minimum order price for free shipping
general.show_free_shipping_notification_info: Encourage customers add more to cart to earn free shipping.
general.upgrade_version_info: In case you using Blum 2.0.0 by upgrading from an older version, you need to migrate the old color system to the new one. [Learn more](https://saleshunterthemes.com/pages/data-transfomer)
general.background_gradient_info: Background gradient replaces background where possible.
general.accent_info: Applies to emphasized elements in the section
general.currency_paragraph_info: Cart and checkout prices always show currency codes. Example: $1.00 USD.
general.favicon_info: Will be scaled down to 32 x 32px
general.variant_option_info: Enter the variant label that you want to display as swatches
general.variant_rules_info: Format: <Variant option>: <value>(separated by lines). Example: Deep Purple: #7000AA Plastic: plastic.png
general.variant_swatches_info: Blum supports single variant to display as swatches. [Learn more](https://docs.saleshunterthemes.com/manual/blum-theme-settings/#variant-swatches-mechanism)
general.font_scale_info: Changing the font type scale will change the overall font size. [Learn more](https://docs.saleshunterthemes.com/manual/typography/)
general.base_text_size_paragraph_info: Base text size will use as the base size to scale other element's font sizes
general.font_info: Selecting different fonts can affect the speed of your online store. Learn more about system fonts.
general.countdown_info: Time zone will be taken from the shop settings and it can be managed from here.
general.end_date_info: Format: YYYY-MM-DD. If end date is blank, the countdown will finish at midnight tonight.
general.end_text_info: Display when the countdown ends. Hide if empty.
general.hide_on_end_info: Once countdown ends, there's only banner displayed
general.hide_on_end: Hide the countdown when it ends
general.new_in_date_limit_info: Status 'New in' is applied to products created within the selected day range. Set to 0 for no limit.
general.custom_badge_info: Blum supports displaying custom badges in Product card. You can use custom badges to highlight product features such as 'Best Seller', 'Limited Edition', etc. Learn more
general.product_badge_info: Set up stock status conditions in Product information
general.layout_fullwidth_info: Overrides content max-width settings in Theme settings.
general.show_ranking_info: Ranking badges follow the product order above. Reorder to update.
general.show_follow_on_shop_info: To let customers follow your store on the Shop app from your storefront, Shop Pay must be enabled.
general.rating_info: Blum allows product rating from various Shopify partner apps to be displayed on product-related touchpoints such as Product details, Product cards, Quick shop, etc. Add a product rating app to display.
general.product_rating_app_info: Other apps may need extra steps for proper integration. Please contact the app owners for detailed support.
general.show_rating_info: Configure product rating in Theme settings > Product information.
general.hide_on_end_the_countdown: Hide the countdown when it ends
general.hide_on_end_the_countdown_info: Once countdown ends, there's only banner displayed
general.link_info: Link applies to the whole group. Link is inactive if block Buttons is added.
general.link_image_info: Link applied to the whole image.
general.variation_info: Product variations let you link products together. Config in Theme settings > Product information.
general.product_variation_info: Product variations let you link products, enabling you to create unique media sets, sections, colors, and content for each variant while keeping them connected.
general.product_variation_info_2: Available in Product details and Quick view. Learn more
general.product_variation_metafield_info: "Enter namespace and key of the metafield holding the product variation values. For example: custom.color"
general.mega_menu_style_info: Mega menu style applies to desktop only.
general.option_name_info: Show variant options (e.g., size, color) in the Quickshop popup.
general.open_child_menu_by_info: ‘Click' mode is enforced on touch devices and in the drawer menu for better accessibility.
general.section_height_on_screen_info: Section will expand if content exceeded available area
general.link_banner_info: Link applies to the whole banner without button.
general.mega_menu_info: Mega menu only effects on Scroll.
general.font_weight_info: Font weight applies to menu items in the Mega Menu and Drawer, helping highlight different menu levels. Overrides the selected font format.
general.apply_font_weight: Apply font weight to menu item
general.video_slideshow_info: When slide autoplay is enabled, videos longer than the slide change interval will be automatically trimmed and move to the next slide. For smooth playback, match the video length to the slide interval or turn off slide autoplay.
general.getting_started_header_1_paragraph_1: Thank you for choosing Blum, we're excited to be part of your journey.
general.getting_started_header_1_paragraph_2: Let's get your store up in just a few simple steps.
general.getting_started_header_2: Start with your brand's Look & Feel:
general.getting_started_header_2_paragraph_1: • Upload your logo: Sections > Header > Logo > Upload your brand logo.
general.getting_started_header_2_paragraph_2: • Choose a preset: Theme Settings > Theme style.
general.getting_started_header_2_paragraph_3: • Set colors & fonts: Theme Settings > Colors & Typography.
general.getting_started_header_3_paragraph_1: Blum offers 5 presets that tailored to different niches and styles.
general.getting_started_header_3_paragraph_2: If you prefer to customize, feel free to mix and match our Banners (image or video), Featured collections, Testimonials, Custom section with theme blocks and more, to craft a homepage that truly reflects your brand.
general.getting_started_header_3_paragraph_3: Tip: Blum is optimized for mobile-first by default.
general.getting_started_header_4_paragraph_1: • Product Pages: various media gallery layouts, content blocks, product cross-sell, and sticky add-to-cart.
general.getting_started_header_4_paragraph_2: • Collection Pages: choose grid styles, filter options, and promotional banners.
general.getting_started_header_4_paragraph_3: • Cart & Checkout: enable dynamic Checkout button or Cart drawer for a seamless experience.
general.getting_started_header_6_paragraph_1: Once you're happy with your design:
general.getting_started_header_6_paragraph_2: • Choose ‘Preview' to test everything before launch.
general.getting_started_header_6_paragraph_4: Still need help? Visit the Blum Help Center for manuals, FAQs or Contact us.
general.getting_started_header_7_paragraph_1: If you love how Blum helps, we'd truly appreciate it if you could leave us a review on the Shopify Theme Store. Your feedback helps us improve and means the world to our team.
general.languages_support_rlt_info: Enter ISO language code, separate by comma. Leave blank to enable for all languages. Check ISO language code
general.show_sticky_popup_when_dismissed: Sticky popup is triggered when the full form is dismissed. Click the sticky button to open the popup again.
general.newsletter_popup_info: To see how the popup is triggered, switch to live view. In the editor, the popup stays visible when section is selected for easier editing.
general.delay_popup_info: Time to wait before showing the popup.
general.frequency_info: Number of days before a dismissed popup reappears.
general.show_button_on_info: “Sticky" mode is enforced on touch devices.
general.style_info: “Text" type is only available on large screens. On smaller screens, the button will display as an icon.
general.after_a_set_number_of_days: After a set number of days
general.open_link_in_a_new_tab: Open link in a new tab
general.enable_h1_tag_info: Use <h1> tag for this heading. One per page recommended.
general.countdown_timer_info: Add a countdown timer to this section to create a sense of urgency.
general.hide_countdown_when_ends: Hide the countdown when it ends
general.end_date_format_info: Format: YYYY-MM-DD. If you don't enter a date, midnight tonight will be used.
general.icon_image_info: Use square image for best result
general.block_width_info: By using suitable block width, you can put up to 3 Text blocks with icon on the same line
general.custom_image_square_info: Use square image for best result.
general.desktop_block_width_info: By using suitable block width, you can put up to 3 Text blocks with icon on the same line.
general.mobile_block_width_info: By using appropriate block width, you can put up to 3 Text blocks with icon per row
general.common_components_info: Common components apply to buttons, variant selectors, color swatches, quantity selectors, etc.
general.suggested_links_info: Menu title is used as heading if empty.
general.quick_search_paragraph: To use this section, please enable Quick search in your [Theme settings.](/editor?context=theme&category=search)
general.enable_quick_search_info: Quick search provides convenient navigation, while opening search in Search page offers a more focused experience. Learn how to configure it in [Search page]( https://docs.saleshunterthemes.com/manual/blum-search-result-template/) or [Quick search](https://docs.saleshunterthemes.com/manual/blum-search-result-template/).
general.searchable_fields_info: You can configure what types of results are displayed using the Search & Discovery app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/storefront-search/search-and-discovery-modify-search).

block.icon_block_paragraph: Height will automatically match to maintain a perfect square ratio.
block.countdown_timer_paragraph: Time zone will be taken from the shop settings and it can be managed from here.
block.button_group_paragraph: To add a link or set an action, use the individual Button blocks inside the Button Group.
